person.persName: Charles Lee (Bullitt County farmer and slaveholder)

body.p: Residence: Shepherdsville post office, Bullitt County, KY. A Kentucky-born farmer. Born in Nelson County, KY, son of Wilford Lee and Rebecca Hill. Married Letitia H. Simmons. Held eight slaves, according to 1860 slave schedules.
